00010 #ifdef DEBUG
00011 
00012 //Include C args
00013 #include <cstdarg>
00014 
00015 //debug function
00016 inline void debug(const char *format, ...) {
00017     FILE   *file;
00018     va_list args;
00019 
00020     //get args
00021     va_start(args, format);
00022 
00023     //write error to file
00024     file = fopen("debug.txt", "a+");
00025     vfprintf(file, format, args);
00026     fwrite("\n", 1, 1, file);
00027     fclose(file);
00028 
00029     //end args
00030     va_end(args);
00031 }
00032 
00033 //Assert function
00034 #undef  assert
00035 #define assert(arg) \
00036     do { \
00037         if (!(arg)) { \
00038             debug("Assertion '%s' failed in file '%s' at line %d!", #arg, __FILE__, __LINE__); \
00039             exit(1); \
00040         } \
00041     } while(0)
00042 
00043 #else
00044 
00045 //Debug function
00046 inline void debug(const char *, ...) { }
00047 
00048 //Assert function
00049 #undef  assert
00050 #define assert(arg) ((void) 0)
00051 
00052 #endif /* DEBUG */

00054 //Converts something to a string
00055 template <typename T> inline std::string toString(T val) {
00056     std::ostringstream out;
00057     
00058     //Add value to stream
00059     out << val;
00060 
00061     //Convert stream to string
00062     return out.str();
00063 }
